item.title: License Models Demystified: Per Core vs. Per Socket vs. Subscription
item.description: The Licensing Revolution: Why This Matters More Than Ever The days of simple “per-server” licensing are long gone. In today’s hybrid cloud world, understanding Microsoft’s licensing models isn’t just about complianceâ€”it’s about strategic advantage. The difference between per-core, per-socket, and subscription licensing can mean hundreds of thousands of dollars in your infrastructure budget, and the hidden costs can turn a approved project into a budget disaster. I’ve seen organizations discover they’re paying 40% more than necessary because they didn’t understand Azure Hybrid Benefit.
